definition: root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)

sentences.english: The activities of CAT, a cold-sensitive enzyme, were decreased rapidly in both leaves and roots after chilling.
sentences.chinese: 低温弱光导致了叶片和根系中CAT活性的显著降低。

sentences.english: The distribution position of cotton root system in the tilth is closely related with cotton yield.
sentences.chinese: 棉花根系在耕层分布的位置与产量密切相关。

sentences.english: Water is held so tenaciously that most plant root systems cannot absorb it.
sentences.chinese: 水被牢牢地吸住以至于不能被大多数植物根系吸收。

sentences.english: The root distribution in soil profile has also large effect on activity of the soil enzymes.
sentences.chinese: 林木根系分布规律对林地土壤酶活性有重要的影响。

sentences.english: The roots grew down firmly in the soil.
sentences.chinese: 根系向下生长深入土里。

sentences.english: The 3 particular properties of soybean roots growth are the mechanism of soybean for fertilizing soil.
sentences.chinese: 大豆根系生长的三个特点是大豆肥田的机制。

sentences.english: Fibrous root systems are characteristic of monocotyledons .
sentences.chinese: 须根系是单子叶植物的特征。

sentences.english: But you do have to remember by butterflying, you are cutting down the overall height of that root ball.
sentences.chinese: 但是你必须记住，通过切瓣降低了球根系的整体高度。

sentences.english: There are 24 kinds of allelochemicals of root exudates in pepper.
sentences.chinese: 辣椒根系分泌物的化感物质共有24种。

sentences.english: Withholding Zn supply decreased the root Fe concentration.
sentences.chinese: 停止供锌，明显降低根系全铁含量。

sentences.english: The weight of roots increased in deep soil layer with treatment of non-irrigation.
sentences.chinese: 重肥处理根系入土深，深土层根量增加。

sentences.english: Nitrogen phosphorus nutrition possess very fine adjustment action on root system growth of wheat.
sentences.chinese: 氮磷营养对小麦根系生长具有明显的调节作用。

sentences.english: Wild dogwoods are often poorly shaped and have an unevenly developed root system.
sentences.chinese: 野生的山茱萸通常形状比较差，且根系的生长不均匀。

sentences.english: Mammals damage orchards on every continent by girdling roots.
sentences.chinese: 哺乳动物在各地对种子园的危害是咬断根系。

sentences.english: Effects of deep tillage on root growth and distribution of rice were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 就深耕法对水稻根系生长和分布的影响进行了讨论。

sentences.english: The mangrove forest also sequesters carbon dioxide in its root system.
sentences.chinese: 红树林的的根系可以起到隔绝碳的作用。

definition: tiller (stem at the base of grass plants)
